name: Nightmare (itch) (Bob I-Ne)
description:
So, this game is arcade about surviving in your dark flat, where some Angry Shadows want to kill you... There you can see timer how long you was surviving.

There you need find Apple and throw it in enemy, using your mouse. 1 apple = 1 kill. And when you loose your only one apple, you should concentrate and find a new one somewhere, until someone didn't eat you :)

Now with 3 difficult modes! (you can start to play on easy, after go in hard and get fun)

How to play

* A/D or arrows to move your character.
* Use your mouse!
** Grab your apple with mouse.
** Move your apple with mouse.
** Up your mouse button to throw your apple.
